item.title: Introduction
item.description: I treat software development with the same approach that Don Norman would apply to everyday things ðŸ™ƒ am eccentric at times, but could never match Bryan Cantrill. the Illumos talk at LISA11 will forever be etched in my memory a software developer Chomsky reader
